verbs.description: President Buhari visit to United States of America on the invitation of U.S President Donald Trump ha [V: been] generating a lot of reaction from Nigerians on social media . Buhari met with Trump at the White House on Monday and both leaders discuss the U.S – Nigeria relationship , trade barriers , security amongst others . After the meeting at the oval of office , both Presidents came out for a press conference .
